attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Women and people from Black, Asian and Minority Ethnic communities, who are working towards a job in the taxi industry, will now have new opportunities to train to be a licensed taxi driver under a project being launched by the Mayor of London and the London Development Agency.


Female, ethnic or not it should make no difference but to single out a person because of their race or sex is discrimination

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
